## MapViewOptions.polarGeometryLevelOffset property

Storage level offset of regular tiles from reference datasource to align \[\[PolarTileDataSource\]\] tiles to. Default is `-1`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
polarGeometryLevelOffset?: number;
```
